name: Plague Doctor
description:
Heal hordes of diseased as a plague doctor in a medieval town.

You have equipped yourself with the latest protective gear, a cane and some medicinal herbs. Facing you is a 100 citizens of a town suffering from the black plague epidemic. Can you free the city from this blight or will you join a long list of corpses who tried and failed before?

Arrow keys - moving

Z - Cane smash

X - Medicinal bottle

C - Healing flash
